title: Fed Tapering and Federal Spending - What to Expect
description: What's next for the Fed? And how will the markets react to new spending and tax initiatives? Barry Knapp, managing partner at Ironsides Macroeconomics, joins Barron's writer Lisa Beilfuss to discuss monetary policy, fiscal policy and coming changes at the Federal Reserve.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
